about_the_game:
• New science fiction story: do optional quests and even optional main quests in a modern world. All dialogue can be skipped and restored to a certain extent. Based on a three book story.
  • Larinite's turn-based combat: against enemies and bosses. Clarity in combat.
  • Many choices in combat: character classes, pets, consumables and equipment.
  • Exploration and creature collection: explore the world and collect creatures. One pet from every element to choose from as your starter pet (there are only 8 elements).
  • Design: your own home and choose what your private city will be like.
  • Many non-combat skills: to work on such as fishing, cooking and metalworking.
  • Reputation (community relationship) system: for NPCs with unique rewards.
  • Larinite's randomness safeguard: allows for different runs and outcomes, and prevents too much repetition.

short_description: An open world RPG based on an original three book story. Beat bosses, capture creatures, or progress through the game with your non-combat skills such as fishing. Do quests to change your reputation among the people of Meno, or just explore the world and make new discoveries- the choice is yours!
